subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which of the following rulers is considered as the founder of Jaipur State?
question_hi: जयपुर स्थान के निवासकार कौन से निवासकार हैं ?
explanation_en: Rao Jodha is considered as the founder of Jaipur State. He built the city of Jaipur in the 15th century.
explanation_hi: राव जोध राजस्थान के निवासकार है। 15वीं वर्षों में Jaipur की समृदन बनने के लिए।

subject: Rajasthan History
